description: This file is a React component for handling OAuth callback redirects in a Next.js application. It processes URL query parameters to redirect users to the appropriate provider-specific page or a default connect page, displaying a suspense fallback during processing.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main component that wraps the inner routing logic with React Suspense to handle lazy loading and fallback UI.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Inner component that performs side effects based on URL parameters to redirect the user accordingly.
